_project.description: 100% Route using Great Eagle Bow with WMC
_project.name: 100% OmeGEB

SoR clip.notes: After cutscene, hold ZL and hop left to exit

_Equipment::Weapon<Torch and Axe>.notes: Sidehop down the hill while grabbing torch to avoid dialogue

_Material<Seared Steak>.notes: Make sure to eat before IST

_Material<2 Hylian Shroom>.notes: Get more shrooms on Satori for scrap

_Material<2 Endura Shroom>.notes: Save one to cook, can eat the other

_Material<1 Acorn>.notes: Do not eat. Do not pick up extra acorns.

Through unloaded gate.notes: Drop 5 Branches, and get 5 Bomb Arrows and Falcon Bow while waiting for cutscene

_Equipment::Weapon<Royal Claymore>.notes: Sneakstrike Moblin, get his weapon, get Naydra's Fang

Kill .enemy(Lizalfos) for parts.notes: Lizalfos Tail, 2 Lizalfos Talon, Lizalfos Horn

_Cook<Cook food>.notes: 5 Lotus Seeds in one dish, 5 Durians in another, 1 Endura Shroom on its own

_Chest<3 Ancient Arrows>.notes: Eat speed food and hearty food

_Chest<Dinraal's Fang>.notes: Run out the top and windbomb

_Equipment::Shield<Hylian Shield>.comment: Get the shield and warp out

Kill 1-3 .enemy(Stalkers).notes: Looking for 0-3 Screws, 2 Spring and 1 Shaft. Pick up a Core if you get one. Do not pick up extra.

_Chest<Knight's Broadsword>.comment: .rune(Magnesis) out of water, .rune(Bomb) get 4 Hyrule Bass

_Shrine::KayaWan.notes: Skip Ancient Core if you already have one

_Material<1 Energetic Rhino Beetle>.notes: On tree near shop. Make morning if needed.

_Npc<Clavia>.notes: Secret of the Cedars shrine quest

Slated for Upgrades.notes: If less than 3 screws, upgrade sensor when you come back later

_Npc::SheikaMale<Olkin>.notes: At pumpkin patch before 5pm; goes to shelter near northern campfire at 5pm; starts running around the village at 8pm

.boss(Windblight Ganon).notes: Ancient Arrow + .rune(Stasis) → 1 FDB body + 4 FDB Head

_Material<Luminous Stones>.notes: 10 needed, can get more later. Take any flint you get too.

_Tod::Morning.notes: Timing for ice house quest and Beedle at stable

.boss(Kohga).notes: Clear ragdoll and skew during Kohga

Shoot 4 feet.notes: Wait until Riju's question, then choose "Keep up the fight!" Use minimap to find Naboris.

.boss(Thunderblight).comment: AA, .rune(Stasis) → 2 AA Normal GEB + 1 Fire/Ice/Electric Arrow OmeGEB (No headshots)

_Npc::Gerudo<Ice House>.notes: Bring ice up stairs, then melt. Stand over it and shoot the top face with a fire arrow to get a consistent size.

_Tod::Noon.notes: Timing to reach Suma Sahma between 4:00pm and 5:30pm. Make noon later in this segment if you're getting there too late.

_Boss::Talus::Luminous.notes: Intentionally "wasting" a fury. Look for 10 amber, 11 flint, and 10 luminous stones.

_Korok::W60.notes: There is an RNG lizalfos that may have a Moblin Club. Take it to skip getting it later.

Activate .!!(Pedestal).notes: 4:00-5:30pm. After 4:40pm, you can use a cryo block in the puddle.

Kill .enemy(Blue Lizalfos).notes: IST leaves us with 8 of 9 required lizalfos horns. Get the 9th one here.

_Korok::N30.notes: Aim with bow to get apples to spawn

.dir(<E) + .dir(<W).notes: Windbomb .dir(<E) away from the mountain, until you reach the trees on the minimap, and then back. Otherwise, Naydra will not spawn. Make morning at the spot marked on the map, and point the camera up at the peak of the mountain.

_Discover<Luto's Crossing>.notes: Discover location as you fly over

.boss(Waterblight).comment: .rune(Stasis) → 2 AA Normal GEB + 1 AA OmeGEB (no headshots)

_Npc::ZoraFemale<Laruta>.notes: Will be running toward west stairs

_Npc::ZoraMale<Gruve>.notes: Diving is Beauty! Quest reward is 5 Fleet-Lotus Seed, will use for transmutation.

_Npc::ZoraMale<Fronk>.notes: 7:00am to 8:00pm, Fronk is at the pillar. Otherwise he is at the pools.

_Boss::Talus::Luminous.notes: Wake with bomb arrow, then use AA. Collect 10 amber, 11 flint, and 10 luminous stones. If you don't have 10 amber by now, break ores in Eldin and Rudania entry until you have 10.

_Tod::Night.notes: To talk to Greyson. Must have Flamebreaker Armor equipped to sleep.

_Npc::Goron<Yunobo>.notes: You can get into the cave before the rocks load in. If you don't, ESC through the back.

_Boss::Talus::Igneo.notes: Igneo taluses have the best chance to drop flint. Collect drops here and from the remaining three igneo taluses until you have 11 flint.

_Tod::Morning.notes: Look west when sitting at campfire. Facing east can stop Dinraal from spawning.

_Material<Lynel Hoof>.notes: 94% chance to get one, but if you don't, kill lynel near A07.

_Snap::Quest<Kilton>.notes: It's common for the camera to not register Kilton. Take 2-3 snaps from different angles to be safe.

_Snap::Quest<Blupee>.notes: If the Blupees run away, you can take a backup picture later at Kakariko.

Look up .!!(East) in the sky.notes: Watch the Salvager chest until it lands, or it can despawn. After it lands, check the weather to see if it will rain when delivering the blue flame. If it will be raining, make morning or noon now to avoid rain and night enemies.

_Korok::A16.notes: Getting the korok will un-smuggle the torch. Carefully jump down without running or pulling paraglider to finish delivery.

_Tod::Night.notes: For stalhorse, stalnox, and quests after Rudania

Escort Yunobo.notes: Break ores during escort if missing amber (10) or flint (11)

.boss(Fireblight).comment: .rune(Stasis) → 2 AA Normal GEB Body + 1 AA OmeGEB Head

_Discover<Lost Woods>.notes: BLSS should pass through this location

_Npc<Tasho>.notes: Move forward until you hear Oaki's dialogue to trigger the escort. Don't follow Oaki; he'll move along his path while we do the next steps. Note the in-game time that he starts moving; he will arrive at the shrine 5:20 later.

Activate .loc(Keo Ruug).notes: Don't enter shrine or Oaki will reset

_Material<2 Bird Egg>.notes: In tree near Hestu and near Deku tree entrance. For transmutation.

_Equipment::Weapon<Master Sword>.notes: Pulling the Master Sword sets durability of equipped weapon to 40. DO NOT EQUIP 800 DURABILITY CLAYMORE

Follow Oaki.notes: Follow blue nightshades → honey → hollow log → nightshades. Don't get too close to Oaki.

_Material<10 Restless Crickets>.notes: Spin attack grass to collect while walking to Oaki. Can buy 5 Dueling Peaks Stable worst case

_Equipment::Shield<Rusty Shield>.notes: Keep the shield for a korok later

_Discover<Zelda's Room>.notes: Run into the room to get location

_Boss::Hinox::Blue.notes: Shoot midair on the way to R40

_Tod::Noon.notes: For Sasa Kai timing. Can make noon later in this segment for more margin of error.

_Snap::Quest<Forgotten Sword>.notes: This picture is lenient, so long as you zoom in and get the top of the sword in the picture.

Activate Pedestal.notes: Smash an ore and take a luminous stone for easier menuing. Check that you have at least 10.

_Korok::W02.notes: Keep at least 4 bananas for transmutation

_Npc::Gerudo<Malena>.notes: Medicinal Molduga: 2pm to 10pm she's on the steps to throne room, otherwise in training yard. Talk twice.

Look .dir(SE) in the sky.notes: For Salvager chest. Watch it land.

_Material<Octorok Balloon>.notes: If you don't get one, you can buy one from the shop in Lurelin

_Npc<Blynne>.notes: Need to finish twice, one under 1:30 and one under 1:15, to get horse saddle and bridle. Can dismount horse to restart if needed.

_Boss::Hinox::Stal.notes: Kill stalnox while the horse is approaching you.

Archery Minigame.notes: Talk to guy while mounted on horse. Need to finish twice, with scores of at least 20 and 23, to get the saddle and bridle.

_Npc<Parcy>.notes: Talk twice for Royal Guard's Gear quest

_Npc<Gotter>.notes: Talk twice. In stable if raining.

_Discover<East Post Ruins>.notes: Glide below the height of the pole to trigger the location.

Kill .enemy(Stalkoblin).notes: Need to get here at night, otherwise get the one in Kakariko later.

_Discover<Spring of Courage>.notes: Need to walk out past statue to trigger it

.fury() .!!(Enemy Camp).notes: Ancient arrow on the enemies that aren't killed by fury

_Chest<Any of 4 Chests>.notes: Center of rock triangle. Use cryo blocks to get there.

_Npc::SheikaMale<Sebasto>.notes: Take Back the Sea quest. In house if raining.

_Npc<Rozel>.notes: Select "About the ocean...". Talk twice. In house when raining.

_Boss::Hinox::Red.notes: Shoot from above, aim just below upper rim of hole

Destroy letter.notes: When you return to Finley, the letter will respawn on land

Letter Quest.notes: BLSS the letter to the guy at the tent. Fall and don't pull glider, and the letter will survive. Don't fall into water.

_Tod::Noon.notes: Make noon later if you can't get to Balloon Girl by 8pm.

_Discover<Rauru Settlement Ruins>.notes: With superlaunch, can get this location while gilding through on the way to Helmhead Bridge

_Boss::Talus::Luminous.notes: Waste a fury if it's not raining. If raining, save a fury to kill the Keese around C09.

_Tod::Night.notes: If needed for stalnox. Make sure it's night before approaching the first flower of next korok.

Activate .!!(Pedestal).notes: Talk to Kheel for Korok Leaf if you don't have one

_Npc<Toren>.notes: Talk twice. In stable if raining.

_Tod::Night.notes: Timing for Zora's Domain quests and darner quest

_Warp::Shrine::ShadaNaw.notes: Make night for Stalnox if needed.

_Npc::ZoraMale<Tumbo>.notes: 7am-4pm near Mipha's statue, 4pm-8pm near Fronk. Talk twice.

_Discover<Akkala Bridge Ruins>.notes: Glide through location trigger on the way to pebble

Start T06 race.notes: Do H53, H60, T08 while the race timer is going.

_Discover<Sturnida Hot Spring>.notes: Drop down above hot spring, then glide to updraft.

_Tod::Noon.notes: Keep making noon until it's not raining.

Return 2 cuccos.notes: Near shrine and on top of clothes shop

Collect 5 fireflies.notes: If you miss some and scare the rest away, you can respawn them by warping to Taloh Naeg. They don't spawn in rain.

.!!(Transmute).notes: 2 Peppers - 2 Fleet-Lotus Seeds - 4 Bananas | 2 Endura Shroom - 2 Rushroom - 4 Blue Nightshade | 2 Bird Egg - 2 Diamond - 4 Ancient Spring

.fury() waste.notes: If not charged, waste it later.

Kill .enemy(Yiga Blademaster).notes: Normal arrow + OB will make him drop the windcleaver. Using elemental or bomb arrows is inconsistent. Use ancient arrows if you already have the windcleaver.

_Boss::Hinox::Stal.notes: If you don't make it here before 4am, continue and make night before entering Toto Sah. Then kill the Stalnox after D56.

_Chest<Chest in cave>.notes: Open any 1 chest for "Misko the Great Bandit" quest.

_Npc<Nebb>.notes: Turn in all weapons. Nebb wakes at 8am.

Buy compendium pics.notes: If you sold springs last during transmutation and haven't reloaded a save since then, you'll get all the Material pics for free.

_Tod::Night.notes: For Salvager chest. Make night if here after 2:30am.

.!!(Upgrade armor).notes: 7 full upgrades: Set of the Wild, Zora Set, Champion's Tunic

_Npc::SheikaMale<Hudson>.notes: Talk to Hudson again after the wedding

_Npc<Rensa>.notes: Park horse near wagon. Talk to guy, cancel dialogue, talk again.

100%.notes: For verification please show (1) map counter, (2) quest logs, (3) upgraded armor, (4) key items tab.
